issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Unable to set listItem height. Tried this from TSS, JS and XML directly, but still no success.

To reproduce:

add below to your XML file

<Alloy>
	<Window id="findRoomWindow" >
<View id="listContainer"  width="100%" height="100%" backgroundColor="blue" >
			<ListView id="roomList"     bubbleParent="false" >
				<ListSection id="roomListSection" headerTitle="Select A Room"   >
					<ListItem  title="Checking" color="blue" height="180dp" />
					<ListItem  title="Savings" color="red" />
				</ListSection>
			</ListView>
		</View>
	</Window>
</Alloy>
